name: Hoppy Snacktime
description:
Use the arrow keys and space bar to control the character. 

See how many fruits you can eat in this short game! But avoid getting hit by rocks and allowing fruit to hit the ground because that will put an end to your snacktime.

Credits:

  • Background music: 
    Cheery Monday by Kevin MacLeod
    Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3495-cheery-monday

    • Fruits: https://gualtierisgg.itch.io/low-poly-food
  • Heart png: http://www.pngpix.com/download/red-paper-heart-png-image
